DeadlyBoards.board:
Surrounded by a horde of [negative_person]s, you decide to end it all yourself.
      Just to make sure they do not get the joy of doing it themselves.
A [negative_person] masquerading as a [positive_person] took you unawares and ended you.

You suddenly feel [negative_adjective], looking around you realise a nearby [negative_person].
      They acted too swiftly, finishing you off.
